parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The identifier for the organization under which the group exists.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The identifier for the group to be updated. The identifier can accept GroupId, Groupname, or email. The following identity formats are available: Group ID: 12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012 or S-1-1-12-1234567890-123456789-123456789-1234 Email address: group@domain.tld Group name: group.
